translations: vt.<非正式>反复催促（chivvy 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: His mother kept on chivvying him to get his hair cut.
sentences.translation: 他母亲一直唠唠叨叨地催他去理发。

sentences.sentence: But a plan to issue handheld computers to the “enumerators” for chivvying non-replying households had to be cancelled.
sentences.translation: 人工“计数器”们催促收到问卷却没有回音的家庭，但是分发给他们掌上电脑的计划不得不被取消。
